concept.title: Solr Prerequisites
concept.shortdesc: Before you can write to an Apache Solr 6.1.0 node or cluster, you must perform additional steps to enable the machine to connect to Apache Solr 6.1.0.

ol.li:
Verify that Java 8 is installed on the Data Collector machine.
The minimum supported version of Java for Apache Solr 6.1.0 is Java 8.

In the configuration file, $SDC_CONF/sdc.properties, remove the Apache Solr stage library from the system.stagelibs.blacklist property.
Remove the Apache Solr stage library from the property as follows:system.stagelibs.blacklist=streamsets-datacollector-mapr_5_0-lib,streamsets-datacollector-mapr_5_1-lib
Restart and verify that the Solr destination lists Apache Solr 6.1.0 in the Stage Library field.
